links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
prog: (PARI) { x=12; for (n=1, 1000, y=x+1; until (sigma(y) > 2*y, y++); write("b061496.txt", n, " ", gcd(x, y)); x=y ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 23 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 12 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Jason G. Wurtzel_, Nov 21 2006
